existing_features.title: Expand the Nigerian bank options used for withdrawal payout methods to include Kuda Bank, OPay, Moniepoint, and PalmPay, and broaden the list to cover Nigerian online/digital banking options so users can select them during payout method creation.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Nigerian online banking/payment options for withdrawals (e.g., Kuda, OPay, Moniepoint, PalmPay, and other Nigeria banks)

projectName: Add Nigerian digital banks and fintechs to withdrawal payout bank list
